sentences.chinese: 凡音由於人心，天之與人有以相通，如景之象形，響之應聲。
sentences.literal: All sound arises from the human heart, heaven and humans have means to communicate, like shadow's imitating form, echo's responding to sound.

sentences.chinese: 故為善者天報之以福，為惡者天與之以殃，其自然者也。
sentences.literal: Therefore those who do good heaven repays with blessings, those who do evil heaven gives calamity, it is natural.

sentences.chinese: 故舜彈五弦之琴，歌南風之詩而天下治；
sentences.literal: Therefore Shun played five-stringed zither, sang Southern Wind poem and all under heaven was governed;

sentences.chinese: 紂為朝歌北鄙之音，身死國亡。
sentences.literal: Zhou made Zhao Ge northern rustic sounds, body died state perished.

sentences.chinese: 夫南風之詩者生長之音也，舜樂好之，樂與天地同意，得萬國之驩心，故天下治也。
sentences.literal: Indeed Southern Wind poem is growth sound, Shun took joy and liked it, joy united with heaven and earth's intent, obtained ten thousand states' happy hearts, therefore all under heaven governed.

sentences.chinese: 夫朝歌者不時也，北者敗也，鄙者陋也，紂樂好之，與萬國殊心，諸侯不附，百姓不親，天下畔之，故身死國亡。
sentences.literal: Indeed Zhao Ge is unseasonable, northern is defeated, rustic is vulgar; Zhou took joy and liked it, with ten thousand states different hearts, feudal lords did not attach, common people not intimate, all under heaven rebelled against him, therefore body died state perished.

sentences.chinese: 而衛靈公之時，將之晉，至於濮水之上舍。
sentences.literal: And during Duke Ling of Wei's time, leading to Jin, reached Pu Water above lodged.

sentences.chinese: 夜半時聞鼓琴聲，問左右，皆對曰「不聞」。
sentences.literal: Midnight time heard zither playing sound, asked attendants on left and right, all replied 'did not hear'.

sentences.chinese: 乃召師涓曰：「吾聞鼓琴音，問左右，皆不聞。
sentences.literal: Then summoned Master Juan saying: 'I heard zither playing sound, asked attendants, all did not hear.

sentences.chinese: 其狀似鬼神，為我聽而寫之。」
sentences.literal: Its appearance like ghosts and spirits, listen and transcribe it for me.'
Then sat properly took up zither, listened and transcribed it.

sentences.chinese: 明日，曰：「臣得之矣，然未習也，請宿習之。」
sentences.literal: Next day said: 'Your servant got it, but not yet practiced; please allow overnight practice.'
